article: in remarkably conciliatory remarks toward israel , president hosni mubarak on thursday urged palestinians to work with prime minister ariel sharon as their best hope to achieve peace and also urged them to curb the violence that has marked the struggle to end the occupation .
abstract: mubarak urges palestinians to work with sharon
